ta_IN {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u20A8",
            "INR ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Tamil language locale for India" }
        Source { "IBM Globalization Center of Competency, Yamato Software Laboratory" }
        Address { "1623-14, Shimotsuruma, Yamato-shi, Kanagawa-ken, 242-8502, Japan" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Tamil" }
        Territory { "India" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000,October,27 (XML source:2000,July,20)" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[\u0B86\u0BAE\u0BCD]" }
        NoExpression { "^[\u0B87\u0BB2\u0BCD\u0BB2\u0BC8]" }
        YesStr { "\u0B86\u0BAE\u0BCD" }
        NoStr { "\u0B87\u0BB2\u0BCD\u0BB2\u0BC8" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%p%t%f%t%g" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;-\u00A4 #,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c ;%a ;%l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "\u0B95\u0BBE\u0BB2\u0BC8",
                    "\u0BAE\u0BBE\u0BB2\u0BC8",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss aa z",
                    "hh:mm:ss  z",
                    "hh:mm:ss  z",
                    "hh:mm:ss  z",
                    "EEEE dd MMMM yyyy",
                    "EEEE dd MMMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
                    "EEEE dd MMMM yyyy",
                    "EEEE dd MMMM yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u0B9E",
                            "\u0BA4",
                            "\u0B9A",
                            "\u0BAA",
                            "\u0BB5",
                            "\u0BB5",
                            "\u0B9A",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u0B9E\u0BBE\u0BAF\u0BBF\u0BB1\u0BC1",
                            "\u0BA4\u0BBF\u0B99\u0BCD\u0B95\u0BB3\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9A\u0BC6\u0BB5\u0BCD\u0BB5\u0BBE\u0BAF\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BAA\u0BC1\u0BA4\u0BA9\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BB5\u0BBF\u0BAF\u0BBE\u0BB4\u0BA9\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BB5\u0BC6\u0BB3\u0BCD\u0BB3\u0BBF",
                            "\u0B9A\u0BA9\u0BBF",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u0B9C\u0BA9\u0BB5\u0BB0\u0BBF",
                            "\u0BAA\u0BC6\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0BB0\u0BB5\u0BB0\u0BBF",
                            "\u0BAE\u0BBE\u0BB0\u0BCD\u0B9A\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B8F\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0BB0\u0BB2\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BAE\u0BC7",
                            "\u0B9C\u0BC2\u0BA9\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9C\u0BC2\u0BB2\u0BC8",
                            "\u0B86\u0B95\u0BB8\u0BCD\u0B9F\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9A\u0BC6\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0B9F\u0BAE\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B85\u0B95\u0BCD\u0B9F\u0BCB\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BA8\u0BB5\u0BAE\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9F\u0BBF\u0B9A\u0BAE\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCDr",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u0B9C\u0BA9\u0BB5\u0BB0\u0BBF",
                            "\u0BAA\u0BC6\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0BB0\u0BB5\u0BB0\u0BBF",
                            "\u0BAE\u0BBE\u0BB0\u0BCD\u0B9A\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B8F\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0BB0\u0BB2\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BAE\u0BC7",
                            "\u0B9C\u0BC2\u0BA9\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9C\u0BC2\u0BB2\u0BC8",
                            "\u0B86\u0B95\u0BB8\u0BCD\u0B9F\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9A\u0BC6\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0B9F\u0BAE\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B85\u0B95\u0BCD\u0B9F\u0BCB\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCD",
                            "\u0BA8\u0BB5\u0BAE\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCD",
                            "\u0B9F\u0BBF\u0B9A\u0BAE\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BB0\u0BCDr",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
